message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a one-time price of $120. I think you'll really appreciate its value!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is a bit too high for my budget. I'd be willing to pay $60 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $60. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90. What do you think?
I appreciate you meeting me closer, Alice.  How about $75 and we have a deal?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go up to $85. Is that a number you're comfortable with?
